sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The audiofile package contains audiofile libraries, audiofile-config, sfinfo and sfconvert.

sect3.title: audiofile libraries
sect3.para: The audiofile library is used by programs to support AIFF, AIFF-compressed, SUN/NeXT, WAVE and BICS audio formats.

sect3.title: audiofile-config
sect3.para: The audiofile-config script is used during the compile process by programs linking to this library.

sect3.title: sfinfo
sect3.para: The sfinfo program displays the sound file format, audio encoding, sampling rate and duration for audio formats supported by this library.

sect3.title: sfconvert
sect3.para: The sfconvert program converts sound file formats where the origional format and destination format are supported by this library.
